vulnerability_findings.name: assembly
pragma
vulnerability_findings.message:
Different versions of Solidity is used in TestERC20Bridge.sol:
	- Version used: ['ABIEncoderV2', '^0.5.9']
	- TestERC20Bridge.sol#21 declares pragma solidity^0.5.9
	- TestERC20Bridge.sol#83 declares pragma solidity^0.5.9
	- TestERC20Bridge.sol#84 declares pragma experimentalABIEncoderV2

vulnerability_findings.name: solc-version
vulnerability_findings.message:
Detected issues with version pragma in TestERC20Bridge.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.5.9 (TestERC20Bridge.sol#21): it allows old versions
	- pragma solidity^0.5.9 (TestERC20Bridge.sol#83): it allows old versions

vulnerability_findings.name: unused-state
vulnerability_findings.message: IERC20Bridge.BRIDGE_SUCCESS (TestERC20Bridge.sol#27) is never used in TestERC20Bridge

errors: exception (RuntimeError: Source map error, unknown name(SHR) or instr_name(INVALID))

vulnerability_findings.name: Integer Arithmetic Bugs (SWC 101)
vulnerability_findings.message:
The arithmetic operator can overflow.
It is possible to cause an integer overflow or underflow in the arithmetic operation. 
Classification: SWC-101
